```{r}
#| echo: false
pacman::p_load("kableExtra", "tidyverse")
```

```{r} 
#| echo: false
whales <- data.frame(
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
              date = c("8/12/2014","8/13/2014",
                       "8/15/2014","8/16/2014","8/16/2014"),
              site = c("channel", "channel", "harbor", "channel", "channel"),
               spp = c("unknown", "gray", "gray", "humpback", "gray"),
            dist_m = c(400L, 200L, 60L, 300L, 150L),
          behavior = c("breach", "spout", "spout", "feeding", "feeding")
)

# meh table
whales
```

```{r}
# nice kable table for rendering
whales |> 
  kable(col.names = c("Date", "Site", "Species", "Distance (m)", "Behavior")) |>  # update col names 
  kable_classic_2() |> # table themes!
  column_spec(3, bold = TRUE, background = "lightblue") |> 
  add_header_above(c(" ", "A header" = 2, "Another header" = 2))
```
